cash.deposit: Allows depositing money into cash account directly
cash.withdraw: Allows spending money from cash account directly

bank.deposit: Allows depositing money into bank account directly
bank.withdraw: Allows spending money from bank account directly

transaction.pay: Allows paying money to another player through the /pay command

bank.deposit: Allows depositing money from cash to bank
bank.withdrawal: Allows withdrawing money from bank to cash
